section.title: Internationalization
section.para: This section includes information on language support in Fedora.

section.title: iBus
section.para:
iBus has undergone further development and improvements, such as:
Native input method module for Qt4 (ibus-qt).
Key layout support for input method developers. It also enables non-US-QWERTY users to use input methods that were designed only for US-QWERTY.

section.title: Chinese
section.para: More Chinese tables have been ported from scim-table to ibus-table.

section.title: Indic
section.para: Lohit fonts have been split to subpackages for every supported script. Lohit fonts are now Unicode 5.1 compatible.

section.title: Japanese
section.para: IPA fonts have been added to provide good quality fonts with cover of JIS2004. Installation of ipa-gothic-fonts, ipa-pgothic-fonts, ipa-mincho-fonts and ipa-pmincho-fonts packages is recommended to get JIS2004 features on Fedora.
